name: Space Janitor (saitheninja)
description:
You are a brave space janitor that has been woken from hypersleep by... something.

Arrow Keys or WASD to move
X or Enter to attack

This is  a game I made for Shenanijam 2019. The theme I chose was Wrenches 101. This is the first game I've ever made. Make sure you see the final boss.

Achievements:
Maverick - Your team size is 1.
Gameboy - Your game only uses 8-bit soundfx and is in the classic gameboy 4-color green palette. (no sound counts as 8-bit right lol)
